p: Portions of formalin-fixed liver, kidney, lung, heart, and spleen were dehydrated with alcohol, embedded in paraffin wax, cut into 4-5 μm thick sections, and stained with hematoxylin and eosin. Slides were examined in a light microscope at x40 magnification. The microscopic features of the organs of control and treated rats were compared. The study was carried out in the Veterinary Institute, Gannoruwa, Sri Lanka.
